Extracted Variables:
- x: number of patients processed by the automatic machine
- y: number of patients processed by the manual machine

Definitions:
- x: number of patients processed by the automatic machine
- y: number of patients processed by the manual machine

Extracted Constraints:
- Constraint 1: x \leq 20 (At least 20 patients can be processed by the automatic machine)
- Constraint 2: y \geq 2x (At least twice as many patients must have their blood pressure taken by the manual machine than the automatic machine)
- Constraint 3: 10x + 15y \leq 20000 (Total time available for processing patients)

Objective:
- Maximize z = x + y (Maximize the number of patients whose blood pressure can be taken)
